message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a high-quality item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $250.
Alice,  $250 is a bit steep for me.  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to pay $100 right now. Would you be willing to negotiate?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we try $180? It's a bit lower than my initial offer, but I think it's still a fair price for this great product.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $180 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable spending.  I'm willing to go up to $150.  What do you think?
